# Docs Overview

Welcome to the bitvid documentation!

Here you will find guides, community information, and details about our roadmap.

## Sections

- **[Getting Started](#view=docs&doc=getting-started)**: Learn how to watch and share videos.
- **[About](#view=docs&doc=about)**: Learn more about bitvid's mission.
- **[Guides](#view=docs&doc=guides)**: Detailed guides on using bitvid.
- **[Community](#view=docs&doc=community)**: Community guidelines and links.
- **[Roadmap](#view=docs&doc=roadmap)**: What's coming next.
